resources.string:
The game begins with a picks and bans of heroes. Each hero has three characteristics:
- Early Game
- Fighting
- Late Game
 Characteristics of heroes can be found in the hero statistics tab.

After the picks, the match starts. You can place your heroes in three lines:
- Top
- Mid
- Bottom

On each line, the battle is calculated:
In the time interval from 0 to 18 minutes, the characteristic Early game is taken into account. 
In the time interval from 18 to 36 minutes, the characteristic Fighting game is taken into account. 
In the time interval from 36 minutes to the end of the game, the Late Game characteristic is taken into account.
The characterization of heroes taken into account in one line is added up and compared with the sum of the opponentâ€™s characteristics. On whose side the sum is greater, he wins the line.
Let parameter N - be the number of heroes on the line of the team which has a larger sum of characteristics.
Then if the difference between the sums of the characteristics is less than or equal\n 10+ (N-1) * 15, \nboth sides do the kill.

Otherwise, if the difference is less than or equal
 15+ (N-1) * 20, 
only the side with the largest amount of characteristics makes the kill.
 If the difference is greater, then the building is also destroyed.
 To stop the team push on one side, +20 and +50 are added to the formulas, respectively, if you send all your heroes to the same line. Therefore, it is not advisable.
 If no hero comes to the line on one side, and at least one comes on the other, the building is destroyed.
 The game continues until the Ancient is destroyed.

1. If the line comes Alchemist vs Bristleback, then for the characteristics of the Early Game, the difference between them will be 15, so the Bristleback will do the kills, but will not destroy the tower.

2. If the line comes Beastmaster and Clockwerk vs Spectre and Dazzle, then for the characteristics of the Early Game, the difference between them will be 40, so the Beastmaster and Clockwerk will do the kills, and will destroy the tower.
To connect to the multiplayer, both players must be connected to the local wifi network (in other words, to one wifi router). One player must become the host, and the other connect to it.
To become a host you need to click start host and tell your IP address to another player.
To connect to a host, enter the host IP address and click connect to host.
